usage: Audience segment response analysis during events

dataMapping.title: Audience Segment Event Response
dataMapping.subtitle: How different audience segments respond to current events and their behavioral changes

segments.primaryLabel: Audience segment name (e.g., 'News-Seeking Segment', 'Entertainment-Focused Segment', 'Social Media Natives', 'Local Community Segment')
segments.secondaryLabel: Segment category (e.g., 'High-engagement news consumers', 'Entertainment-first viewers', 'Mobile-first social users')
segments.description: Detailed segment behavior during events (e.g., 'Audiences actively seeking breaking news and real-time updates', 'Users who prefer entertainment content during stressful events')
segments.actualLabel: Current event behavior description (e.g., 'High engagement with breaking news', 'Avoiding news content entirely')
segments.targetLabel: Normal behavior baseline (e.g., 'Typical news consumption', 'Standard entertainment viewing')
segments.forecastedLabel: Expected behavior recovery (e.g., 'Gradual return to normal patterns', 'Sustained elevated news interest')

primaryMetric.label: Primary response KPI (e.g., 'Engagement Rate', 'Content Consumption Hours', 'Social Sharing Rate')
primaryMetric.value: Primary KPI value during event (e.g., '65.4%', '4.2 hours', '180 shares/day')

secondaryMetric.label: Secondary response KPI (e.g., 'Session Duration', 'Content Completion Rate', 'Comment Engagement')

segments.budgetAmount: Recommended budget allocation for segment (e.g., '$125K', '35% of event budget')
insights: Segment behavior insights (e.g., 'Strong correlation with breaking news cycles', 'Seeks comfort content during crises', 'Highly reactive to social media trends')
risks: Segment risks (e.g., 'May experience event fatigue', 'Vulnerable to misinformation', 'Could disengage if overwhelmed')
recommendations: Segment strategy recommendations (e.g., 'Develop news-adjacent entertainment content', 'Focus on calming, reassuring messaging', 'Provide fact-checked information')

metadata.size: Segment size (e.g., '2.3M users', '35% of total audience')
metadata.growth: Growth rate during event (e.g., '+25% vs baseline', 'Stable', '-10% engagement')

summary.activeSegments: Number of highly engaged segments during event
summary.growthOpportunity: Segment with highest growth potential during event
